about_the_game:
Yūbari stands out among cruisers for her destroyer-like concealment, speed, and torpedoes; she stands out among low-tier ships for her excellent AA armament.

Key features:

  • Access to the Aiming Systems Modification 0 upgrade

  • High AA defense efficiency

  • High maneuverability

  • Low damage per minute.

This package includes:

  • Yūbari, Japanese Tier IV cruiser

  • 1x Award container: Exclusive box that drops three random items.

  • Port slot

If you already have this ship in your Port, you will not receive any compensation for her.

The content of this DLC is only playable on World of Warships accounts created via Steam and will be invoiced on your Wargaming Account only once

Yūbari stands out among cruisers for her destroyer-like concealment, speed, and torpedoes; she stands out among low-tier ships for her excellent AA armament.

The content of this DLC is only playable on World of Warships accounts created via Steam and will be invoiced on your Wargaming Account only once

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.7.5
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4570R
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000, Intel Iris 5100
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 43 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280×720
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 45 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920×1080
